thread.section_title: Red Wall Garden Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Beijing, China) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: great hotel
thread.title_full: great hotel - Review of Red Wall Garden Hotel, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: kar0linacz
title: great hotel
text: I stayed at Red Wall Garden for a week together with my mother and we were both very pleased with the hotel. It has a great location, close to the subway and walking distance to for example Wangfuijing Snack Street. We loved having a coffee or breakfast at the patio of the hotel. The staff at the reception desk was always very helpful with for example bookings or guiding us through the city.
